h2: A guide to to at-home ore creation

We at Kitsune Industries want you to have the most fun possible during your stay in the world we find ourselves in, and we understand that not everyone wants to go drudging through the mines and tunnels in order to find the ore that they require. To this end, we've put together this book to serve as a guide of how to create your own artifical ore from the comfort of your own home using several different methods. We truely hope that you enjoy this book, and use it to find just the right method for you.
